animalAdoptR 0.0.0.9000

Convert multiple columns to factors + Converts specified columns in a data frame to factor type.

convert_to_factors.Rd

Convert multiple columns to factors + Converts specified columns in a data frame to factor type.

Usage

convert_to_factors(data, columns)

Arguments

data

A data frame

columns

A character vector of column names to convert to factors

Value

A data frame with specified columns converted to factors

Examples

df <- data.frame(
  animal_type = c("dog", "cat", "bird"),
  sex = c("M", "F", "M"),
  adopted = c("Yes", "No", "Yes")
)
convert_to_factors(df, c("animal_type", "sex", "adopted"))
#>   animal_type sex adopted
#> 1         dog   M     Yes
#> 2         cat   F      No
#> 3        bird   M     Yes
